subtitle: This lovely autumnal dessert could also be made with Bramely apples.

method.text: Stick a clove into each pear. Lay on their sides with the cinnamon sticks in an ovenproof dish. Scatter over the cardamom seeds.
Gently heat the red wine, maple syrup and sugar in a pan for 3-5 min until sugar has dissolved. Pour over the pears., ensuring they are half covered.
Bake for about 1 hour until tender, basting occasionally.
Remove cloves, cardamom seeds and cinnamon before serving.

title: Spicy maple poached pears
